casebody.data:
Clarence HENDERSON, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent. WD 80290 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: APRIL 10, 2018 Damien Sepher Bhakti De Loyola, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Nathan J. Aquino, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Two: James Edward Welsh, Presiding Judge, Alok Ahuja, Judge, Anthony Rex Gabbert, Judge

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Clarence Henderson appeals from a judgment denying his Rule 24.035 motion for post-conviction relief following an evidentiary hearing. Henderson pleaded guilty to discharging a firearm from a vehicle and was sentenced to fifteen years' imprisonment pursuant to Section 559.115, RSMo.Cum.Supp.2013. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
